root.name: Daisy Fuentes Pilates
root.description: On August 4, 2009, the video game Daisy Fuentes Pilates was released for the Wii. It is the first game to feature just pilates for the console. The game is fully compatible with the Wii Balance Board and features ten pilates routines and the ability to create customizable workouts. As the box says, you can "Tone, Strengthen and Transform your body."
